TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentDisposition extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 MIME 协议 Content-Disposition 标头。

span.span: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Disposition header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的信息类附带电子邮件发送到其目标时包含附件的电子邮件。The information in the class accompanies an email message that contains attachments when the email message is sent to its destination. 中的信息可由显示电子邮件发件人预期的方式呈现电子邮件附件的软件。The information in can be used by software that displays email to present the email attachments in the manner intended by the sender. 使用的实例创建电子邮件类。Email messages are created using instances of the class. 实例类用于将附件添加到电子邮件。Instances of the class are used to add attachments to email messages. 若要修改对于附件，获取从实例属性。To modify the for an attachment, get the instance from the property. 要显示的内容作为消息的一部分正文具有处理设置类型的。Content to be displayed as part of the message body has the disposition type of . 不会显示，但在单独的文件附加的内容具有处理设置类型的。Content that is not displayed but is attached in a separate file has the disposition type of . 使用属性控制与实例关联的附件的处理类型。Use the property to control the disposition type for the attachment associated with an instance of . 为文件附件，你可以使用的属性若要设置的文件大小，以及该文件的创建的日期，最后一个读取，和上次修改。For file attachments, you can use the properties of the to set the file size, as well as the date the file was created, last read, and last modified. 对于所有的附件，你可以设置建议的文件名称的事件中附件存储在接收端的计算机上。For all attachments, you can set a recommended file name in the event that the attachment is stored on the receiving computer. 方法返回的 Content-disposition 标头。The method returns the Content-Disposition header. 在 RFC 2183 中描述的 Content-disposition 标头[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建带有附件是以内联方式显示的电子邮件。The following code example creates an email message with an attachment to be displayed inline. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于发送电子邮件中发送的文件时间戳信息。The property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message. 此值与电子邮件发送的 Content-disposition 标头中设置的创建日期参数。This value sets the Creation-Date parameter in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email. 类用于撰写一封电子邮件。The class is used to compose an email message. 类用于将文件附加到电子邮件。The class is used to attach a file to an email message. 若要设置，获取附件的属性。To set , get the for the attachment from the property. 在 RFC 2183 中描述的 Content-disposition 标头[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示电子邮件来确定正确的方法，以提供电子邮件附件的软件时可以使用属性值。The property value can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments. 在用户打开电子邮件时，通常显示附件。 attachments are usually displayed when the user opens the email. 直到用户执行某些操作，例如单击一个图标表示附件，附件通常未打开。 attachments are usually not opened until the user performs some action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment. 在 RFC 2183 中描述的 Content-disposition 标头[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. member this.FileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置电子邮件附件的建议文件名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the suggested file name for an email attachment.
A that contains the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许发件人建议可用于接收方的计算机上存储电子邮件附件的名称。The property allows the sender to suggest the name to be used to store an email attachment on the recipient's computer. 此名称只是建议;接收的系统可以忽略它。This name is a suggestion only; the receiving system can ignore it. 名称不能包含路径信息;接收方计算机的情况下，将忽略任何此类信息。The name must not include path information; any such information is ignored by the receiving computer. 若要删除文件名称信息，可以将此属性设置为`null`或为空字符串 ("")。To remove file name information, you can set this property to `null` or the empty string (""). 在 RFC 2183 中描述的 Content-disposition 标头[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值确定电子邮件附件的处置类型（内联或附件）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the disposition type (Inline or Attachment) for an email attachment.

value.span: 如果附件中的内容以内联方式作为电子邮件正文中; 的一部分否则为。

span.span: if content in the attachment is presented inline as part of the email body; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与该电子邮件发送的 Content-disposition 标头中设置的处理类型。The property sets the disposition type in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email message. 显示以确定正确的方法，以提供电子邮件附件的电子邮件的软件可处理类型。The disposition type can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments. 处置的附件类型通常显示在用户打开电子邮件时。Attachments with a disposition type of are usually displayed when the user opens the email. 处置的附件类型通常未打开直到用户执行一些其他操作，例如单击一个图标表示该附件。Attachments with a disposition type of are usually not opened until the user performs some additional action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment. 在 RFC 2183 中描述的 Content-disposition 标头[ https://www.ietf.org ](https://www.ietf.org/)。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property.
